# Introduction
I created a web page using R Markdown that show the Eiffel Tower in a map created with Leaflet.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
```
```{r}
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(lat=48.8584, lng=2.2945, popup = "Eiffel Tower")

my_map
```
